script.name: PL.TradeRun.Buy.SM
script.description: Menu: Trade Run: Buy - Set Menu

line.comment: * $Has = $This-> get amount of ware $SelectedWare in cargo bay

line.text: '> to ignore them and find more clients use Trade Product Search instead (manual trade).'

line.comment: * $Has = $This-> get amount of ware $SelectedWare in cargo bay
* $Index = get index of $SelectedKeepShopping in array $Values.KeepShopping offset=0
* add value selection to menu: $Menu, text='Standby', value array=$Values.KeepShopping, default=$Index, return id='KeepShopping'

sval.val: Menu: Trade Run: Buy - Set Menu
> to ignore them and find more clients use Trade Product Search instead (manual trade).
$Has = $This-> get amount of ware $SelectedWare in cargo bay
$Has = $This-> get amount of ware $SelectedWare in cargo bay
$Index = get index of $SelectedKeepShopping in array $Values.KeepShopping offset=0
add value selection to menu: $Menu, text='Standby', value array=$Values.KeepShopping, default=$Index, return id='KeepShopping'
